data.name: Donna Marianna
data.description: This red wine is ruby red with an intense nose of spices and red fruits. it has a high tannin level, and yet it is still quite smooth in the mouth with a persisting taste.

data.name: ALKÉ NERO D’AVOLA
data.description: This wine has seen only steel and bottle, so it keeps its floral and fruity freshness.

data.name: CONTE
data.description: this red wine is aged in steel. it is a biological winery located in marche, they harvest by hand and their wines are natural.
